languages.text: {n}По привычке хватаясь за треснувший камень, эльдарка пятится назад.{/n} "Нет, {name}. Ты не можешь так со мной поступить. Н-не можешь..." {n}Страх и отчаяние расцветают в ее глазах, и, не дождавшись ответа, Ирлиэт разворачивается и бежит прочь — подальше от вас.{/n}

{n}Gripping the broken stone out of habit, Yrliet backs away.{/n} "No, {name}. You cannot do this to me. Y-you cannot..." {n}Fear and despair grow in her eyes, and, without waiting for an answer, Yrliet turns around and runs — to get away from you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}По привычке хватаясь за треснувший камень, эльдарка пятится назад.{/n} "Нет, {name}. Ты не можешь так со мной поступить. Н-не можешь..." {n}Страх и отчаяние расцветают в ее глазах, и, не дождавшись ответа, Ирлиэт разворачивается и бежит прочь — подальше от вас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Clenching the broken stone out habit, the Aeldari backs off.{/n} "No, {name}. You cannot do this to me. Y-you cannot..." {n}Fear and despair grow in her eyes, and, without waiting for an answer, Yrliet turns around and runs — to get away from you.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特习惯性地握住胸前破碎的灵魂石，向后踉跄了几步。{/n}“不，{name}。你不能这样对我。你、你不能……”{n}她的目光流露出无尽的恐惧与绝望，还没等你说出下一句话，伊莉耶特就转身跑开了——她再也不愿意待在你的身边。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Gripping the broken stone out of habit, Yrliet backs away.{/n} "No, {name}. You cannot do this to me. Y-you cannot..." {n}Fear and despair grow in her eyes, and, without waiting for an answer, Yrliet turns around and runs — to get away from you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特习惯性地握住胸前破碎的灵魂石，向后踉跄了几步。{/n}“不，{name}。你不能这样对我。你、你不能……”{n}她的目光流露出无尽的恐惧与绝望，还没等你说出下一句话，伊莉耶特就转身跑开了——她再也不愿意待在你的身边。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet retrocede y se lleva las manos a la joya rota por la fuerza de la costumbre.{/n} «No, {name}. No me puedes hacer esto. N-no puedes...». {n}El miedo y la desesperación se apoderan de ella, y sin aguardar una respuesta, Yrliet se gira y echa a correr para alejarse de ti.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Gripping the broken stone out of habit, Yrliet backs away.{/n} "No, {name}. You cannot do this to me. Y-you cannot..." {n}Fear and despair grow in her eyes, and, without waiting for an answer, Yrliet turns around and runs — to get away from you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet retrocede y se lleva las manos a la joya rota por la fuerza de la costumbre.{/n} «No, {name}. No me puedes hacer esto. N-no puedes...». {n}El miedo y la desesperación se apoderan de ella, y sin aguardar una respuesta, Yrliet se gira y echa a correr para alejarse de ti.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Machinalement, Yrliet porte la main à sa pierre et fait un pas en arrière.{/n} « Non, {name}. Vous ne pouvez pas me faire ça. V-Vous ne.... » {n}Vous percevez la peur et le désespoir dans son regard. Sans attendre votre réponse, elle se retourne et s'enfuit. Loin de vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Gripping the broken stone out of habit, Yrliet backs away.{/n} "No, {name}. You cannot do this to me. Y-you cannot..." {n}Fear and despair grow in her eyes, and, without waiting for an answer, Yrliet turns around and runs — to get away from you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Machinalement, Yrliet porte la main à sa pierre et fait un pas en arrière.{/n} « Non, {name}. Vous ne pouvez pas me faire ça. V-Vous ne.... » {n}Vous percevez la peur et le désespoir dans son regard. Sans attendre votre réponse, elle se retourne et s'enfuit. Loin de vous.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Aus Gewohnheit greift Yrliet zu dem zerbrochenen Stein und weicht zurück.{/n} "Nein, {name}. Das könnt Ihr mir nicht antun. D-das könnt Ihr nicht ..." {n}Angst und Verzweiflung erscheinen in ihren Augen, und ohne auf eine Antwort zu warten, dreht Yrliet sich um und rennt – Hauptsache, weg von dir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Gripping the broken stone out of habit, Yrliet backs away.{/n} "No, {name}. You cannot do this to me. Y-you cannot..." {n}Fear and despair grow in her eyes, and, without waiting for an answer, Yrliet turns around and runs — to get away from you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Aus Gewohnheit greift Yrliet zu dem zerbrochenen Stein und weicht zurück.{/n} "Nein, {name}. Das könnt Ihr mir nicht antun. D-das könnt Ihr nicht ... {n}Angst und Verzweiflung erscheinen in ihren Augen, und ohne auf eine Antwort zu warten, dreht Yrliet sich um und rennt – Hauptsache, weg von dir.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}砕けた石を心ともなく握りしめ、ユリエットは後ずさりする。{/n}「止めろ、{name}。お前は我にそんなことはできない。できるはずが…」{n}彼女の目に恐怖と絶望が宿り、答えを待つことなく、ユリエットは振り向きざまに走り出す…あなたから離れるために。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Gripping the broken stone out of habit, Yrliet backs away.{/n} "No, {name}. You cannot do this to me. Y-you cannot..." {n}Fear and despair grow in her eyes, and, without waiting for an answer, Yrliet turns around and runs — to get away from you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}砕けた石を心ともなく握りしめ、ユリエットは後ずさりする。{/n}「止めろ、{name}。お前は我にそんなことはできない。できるはずが…」{n}彼女の目に恐怖と絶望が宿り、答えを待つことなく、ユリエットは振り向きざまに走り出す…あなたから離れるために。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Alışkanlığıyla kırık taşını kavrayan Yrliet, geri çekiliyor.{/n} "Hayır {name}. Bunu bana yapamazsın. Yapamazsın..." {n}Duyduğu korku ve çaresizlik, gözlerinden okunuyor. Cevap vermeni beklemeden arkasını dönüp koşmaya başlıyor, senden kaçıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Gripping the broken stone out of habit, Yrliet backs away.{/n} "No, {name}. You cannot do this to me. Y-you cannot..." {n}Fear and despair grow in her eyes, and, without waiting for an answer, Yrliet turns around and runs — to get away from you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kırık taşı el alışkanlığından tutan Yrliet geri çekiliyor.{/n} "Hayır {name}. Bunu bana yapamazsın. Yapamazsın..." {n}Korku ve çaresizlik gözlerinden okunuyor. Yrliet, cevap vermeni beklemeden arkasını dönüp koşmaya başlıyor, senden kaçıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
